description.@en: Although Friars are not monastic, they have taken a sacred vow of poverty, ministry and evangelizing. Should you stray from the path, you are wracked with extreme guilt, a sin which requires tithe or self-flagellation to correct.

effect.@en: You cannot accumulate property, except for what you may be able to carry upon yourself. Violation of this sacred tenet means you cannot add Skill Ranks to Skill Tests, until you unburden yourself by donating the excess to your religious order and causing yourself enough harm to move three steps down the Peril Condition Track negatively.
